name: Starlight Stalled
description:
Embark on a small road trip to nowhere with a close friend, until you experience some car trouble and have to think of a way to continue the journey.    I really can't say more than that :)   

Some notes:
This game runs on The Blender Game Engine,   it's a buggy engine by nature.
Whatever you do, DON'T press ESC.    

If you wish to skip chapters for some reason, press Numpad+

This game was made for my good friend Sky- Every year we make dedicated birthday games for each other.  This year I decided to go the extra mile and make something with a story and cutscenes.  This took me two months to make,  So I decided to make a public build of this game to see where it goes.

My good friend Sky playing his game:
